summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the Engineering Department; making a partially reimbursable appropriation from the Transportation Improvement West Emerson Urban Arterial Transportation Account (UATA) Street Improvement Project, making an appropriation from the Drainage and Wastewater Fund, accepting money when received, authorizing the Director of the Engineering Department to appraise, negotiate for and acquire real property and property rights, authorizing the hiring of expert and consultant services; and authorizing the awarding of contracts.
